name: Zecro
description:
Zecro is building a modular solution for crypto professionals.

Whether you're a Portfolio Manager searching for risk-based information on Ethereum, A Trader looking for a customizable workflow or a Operations Manager in search of the best solutions to manage cold storage while mitigating security and financial risks. We aim to help individuals and institutions spend less time gathering and piecing together information in a rapidly changing market.
payDisclosure:
While we may try our best, ZECRO token is only a proof that you helped to us to begin this journey. 

Zecro makes no promises to provide anything in return nor benefits to token holders.
